display.title: Pattern P2P Tunnels
description: The &&aPattern P2P Tunnel&&r is an upgraded version of &&9Item/Fluid P2P Tunnels&&r.
The input side is placed on an Pattern Provider containing patterns. It can have multiple outputs, which should connect to inventories.
When multiple crafts of a single pattern are requested, the P2P Tunnel will evenly distribute the crafts between all of the connected outputs.
The Pattern P2P Tunnel also respects &&eBlocking Mode&&r, which is set in the interface containing the patterns.
